about_the_game:
Umbratica Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding tactics game that combines the precise tactical combat of “Into the Breach” and the strategic deck crafting of “Slay the Spire”. Lead a squad of vampire slayers as you banish the fiendish creatures that have taken over the cursed land of Umbratica.


Precise no-RNG tactical turn-based combat: Deploy your squad of vampire slayers in a series of fast-paced grid-based combats. Purge this land from the ghouls, fiends, and other deadly monstrosities that inhabit the night!


Strategic roguelike deckbuilding: Your squad abilities are determined by your deck! So as you make your way through the cursed land of Umbratica you’ll gather new cards. You’ll use these as your squad's attacks, actions, and abilities in combat!


Deeply customizable playstyle: As you play each run you’ll have several options over the way your squad fights. First, you’ll select the heroes that’ll go on your journey, each has their own set of available cards! As your journey progresses you’ll find different cards and you’ll upgrade them to further customize your playstyle, you’ll find powerful ancient relics that affect the functioning of the whole squad, and also mysterious items that can boost (and nerf) individual hero's stats and also add special status during combat. Strategically combine all of these elements to express your playstyle fully!

Roguelike run generation: Each time you dare to adventure into the gothic land of Umbratica the layout will be different. Different combat stages and rewards, different text-based events, different cards, relics, and items. No two runs are the same!

content_descriptors.notes: Combat features pixel blood and violence

short_description: Lead a squad of vampire slayers, craft a powerful deck and combine the effects of ancient relics in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Fight your way through the hordes of the undead and the unholy as you attempt to purge the evil that has taken over the once glorious land of Umbratica.
